name: RioHeating
0:
”Alexa, set the living room to 20 degrees”
”Alexa, what's the temperature of the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Our Rio ARC heater is a genuine game changer when it comes to smart home heating. One of the only heaters in the world to have an advanced WiFi module built in, ARC heaters offer a whole new level of control and are accessible from anywhere in the world via the free Rio app or directly through Apple Home Kit, Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. Sleek, stylish and simple to use, there’s no need for wall thermostats. Just turn your ARC on, scan the QR code, and enjoy the flexibility and many benefits your ARC heater offers.
